snippet: A seventh suspect has been charged in the 2010 killing of a United States Border Patrol agent whose death is at the center of a scandal over a botched American gun-smuggling investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: Rosario Rafael Burboa-Alvarez is charged in 2010 killing of United States Border Patrol agent Brian A Terry, whose death is at center of scandal over botched American gun-smuggling investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious; Burboa-Alvarez is seventh suspect charged in case.
lead_paragraph: A seventh suspect has been charged in the 2010 killing of a United States Border Patrol agent whose death is at the center of a scandal over a botched American gun-smuggling investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.main: Arizona: Another Charge in Border Agent’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Another Charge in Border Agent’s Killing
